mapper.select: select fi.id, fi.type, fi.name, fi.icon from facility_info fi where is_deleted = 0 and fi.id in( select rf.facility_id from room_facility rf where room_id = #{id} and rf.is_deleted = 0 )
select fi.id, fi.type, fi.name, fi.icon from facility_info fi where is_deleted = 0 and fi.id in( select af.facility_id from apartment_facility af where apartment_id = #{id} and af.is_deleted = 0 )
